meanings.definition: The process of combining separate elements into a unified whole.
meanings.sent1: The redintegration of colors in the painting created a beautiful masterpiece.
meanings.sent2: The redintegration of ingredients in the recipe made a delicious dish.
meanings.sent3: The redintegration of toys in the playroom led to a fun and organized space.
meanings.sent4: Her redintegration of ideas in the presentation brought clarity to the audience.
meanings.sent5: The redintegration of melodies in the song produced a harmonious tune.

meanings.definition: The act of restoring something to its original state or condition.
meanings.sent1: After the storm, the redintegration of the garden began to bring back its beauty.
meanings.sent2: The redintegration of the old building preserved its historical significance.
meanings.sent3: His redintegration of the broken vase made it look as good as new.
meanings.sent4: The redintegration of the antique furniture revived its elegance.
meanings.sent5: The redintegration of the painting restored its vibrant colors.
